name: Tiny
description: Very small world, usually with weak gravity and limited atmosphere retention.

name: Medium
description: Mid-sized world near baseline terrestrial scale.

name: Large
description: High-mass world with stronger gravity and deeper potential atmosphere.

name: Huge
description: Very massive world, often with extreme gravity and thick envelopes.

name: Massive
description: Colossal planets, typically gas giants with immense gravitational pull.
